subject: re:Don't have time to visit local drug store
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
You can buy high quality Canadian products for the price lower than for American drugs.Save on your drugs.
Check it out nowhttp://askself.hk
High quality of our products is the subject of our primary concern.No fraud and no scamming is possible.
Best regards,Constance Corbin
